pageProduct.name: Vicks First Defence Nasal Spray
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Vicks® First Defence is a medical device that is clinically proven to help you in the fight against common cold viruses.

How Vicks® First Defence works:
1.TRAP: The micro-gel formula physically encapsulates (traps) the cold virus in the nose and helps to prevent it from developing and spreading.

2.INACTIVATE: The cold viruses are trapped in the micro-gel and inactivated,
reducing their ability to multiply and spread

3.REMOVE: Then, it flushes the nose to help naturally remove the inactivated virus (toward the stomach or by blowing one's nose).

Size: 15mL

KEY FEATURES

• Use it at 1st signs of a cold to help reduce the risk of developing a full blown cold or you can even start using it when exposed to cold viruses!

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.
Use only as directed. Do not use in case of hypersensitivity to ingredients.
Not suitable for children under 12.
Store upright, away from direct sunlight.

Ingredients

Aqua, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose* (1 %), Succinic Acid (1 %), DisodiumSuccinate (0.44 %), PCA (0.35 %), Phenethyl Alcohol, Zinc EDTA, Zinc Acetate, Polysorbate 80,
Menthol, Camphor, Sodium Saccharin, Eucalyptol.

Directions

Apply 2-3 sprays per nostril immediately within the first 24-36 hours after feeling the
1st signs of a cold such as a tickle at the back of your throat, or sneezing.
You can even start using it when feeling at risk of catching a cold. Use up to 4 times a day. Avoid inhaling deeply. For best results, continue to use for 2 days after symptoms subside. Incline the nozzle outwards in the direction of your ear.
